title: UPDATE 2-Belarus surprises rivals with China potash deal

content: SANTIAGO/WINNIPEG  March 18 Shares in Chilean fertilizer group SQM plunged on Wednesday after three board representatives from Canada's Potash Corp resigned in protest at its handling of an illicit payments scandal that has shaken the Chilean establishment.
name: Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan Inc
title: UPDATE 3-SQM stock plummets after directors from Potash Corp resign

content: WINNIPEG  Manitoba  March 18 Potash Corp of Saskatchewan  has made no decision on whether to sell its stake in Chilean fertilizer group SQM   Potash spokesman Randy Burton said.
name: Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan Inc
title: Potash Corp undecided about stake in Chile's SQM

content: SANTIAGO  March 18 Chilean fertilizer group SQM said on Wednesday that the three representatives on its board from Canadian stakeholder Potash Corp had resigned on Tuesday evening  although the company did not say why.
name: Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan Inc
title: Potash Corp representatives resign from SQM board as scandal deepens

content: SAO PAULO  March 2 Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan Inc  the world's largest fertilizer company by market value  agreed on Monday to pay about $56 million for a 9.5 percent stake in Brazilian rival Fertilizantes Heringer SA  the latest effort by Potash to grow in Latin America's largest economy.
name: Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan Inc
title: UPDATE 1-PotashCorp buys 9.5 pct in Heringer to expand in Brazil

content: March 2 Potash Corp of Saskatchewan Inc   the world's biggest fertilizer company by market capitalization  said it would buy a 9.5 percent stake in Brazil's Fertilizantes Heringer SA from its controlling shareholders for $55.7 million.
name: Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan Inc
title: Potash Corp to buy stake in Brazil's Heringer

content: NEW YORK A former Banco Santander SA executive has been indicted for insider trading ahead of a proposed 2010 takeover of Potash Corp of Saskatchewan Inc by the mining group BHP Billiton Ltd  U.S. prosecutors said on Tuesday.
name: Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan Inc
title: U.S. charges ex-Banco Santander executive with insider trading

content: NEW YORK  Feb 3 A former Banco Santander SA  executive has been indicted for insider trading ahead of a proposed 2010 takeover of Potash Corp of Saskatchewan Inc  by the mining group BHP Billiton Ltd  U.S. prosecutors said on Tuesday.
name: Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan Inc
title: UPDATE 2-U.S. charges ex-Banco Santander executive with insider trading

content: Potash Corp of Saskatchewan    the world's biggest fertilizer company by market capitalization  reported higher-than-expected quarterly profit on strong potash sales  but its 2015 outlook disappointed.
name: Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan Inc
title: Potash Corp's profit beats on higher potash sales; outlook misses

content: TORONTO  Jan 29 Canada's main stock index dropped 1.3 percent on Thursday  extending the previous session's sharp fall as investors remained nervous about the Federal Reserve's outlook for raising U.S. interest rates.

title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX drops as Fed worries  energy shares weigh

content: Jan 29 Potash Corp of Saskatchewan    the world's biggest fertilizer company by market capitalization  reported a 77 percent rise in quarterly profit  helped by higher realized prices and lower costs.
name: Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan Inc
title: Potash Corp quarterly profit jumps 77 pct
